basicInfo.name: Ichi
basicInfo.flavor: Confronted with an insurmountable wall even her borrowed yokai powers could not breach, Ichi set out for Aisha to further hone her skills.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Secret Strike
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 245% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Self
 - Heals HP equal to 170% of the caster's Physical Attack.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Quick Ambush
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 245% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Swap
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 45% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]

profile.story:
Moonlit Isle, ravaged by endless civil conflicts, was a place where the line between friends and foes was often blurry.
An enemy might be a friend of your ally, or a friend could turn out to be the child of your foe.
In such chaos, information was the most valuable weapon, making Moonlit Isle the perfect stage for ninjas to thrive.
Ichi didn't care whether Ace's or Waki's side of the conflict was the most just.
What mattered most was choosing the side that offered the most profit.

basicInfo.name: Ichi
basicInfo.flavor: Ichi made a pact with a fox yokai, figuring assassinating the enemy commanders would be easy with the yokai's power. However, when Ichi snuck into the enemy camp at night, she was greeted by Teo and Silvesta.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Secret Strike
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 220% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Self
 - Heals HP equal to 155% of the caster's Physical Attack.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 220% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Quick Ambush
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 220% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Death. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 220% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Swap
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 30% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]

basicInfo.name: Ichi
basicInfo.flavor: The civil war on Moonlit Isle presented ninjas with a golden chance to elevate their reputation. Ichi figured it would be more advantageous to side with the rebellion than the young lord.

Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.
